content: **free heart coaster pattern** this quick and easy crochet heart coaster adds a handmade touch of love to your table or gift baskets perfect for valentine s day weddings or everyday use it works up fast with basic stitches and is great for beginners or stash-busting projects use cotton yarn for a functional coaster or acrylic for a cute decorative piece skill level - easy materials required - worsted weight yarn - 4mm crochet hook - scissors - tapestry needle the heart coaster will measure about 12 cm when made with the recommended yarn
